segments.text: I love your bracelet . When did you get it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got it a while ago , but I haven't worn it much . You really like it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . It's beautiful . Is it white gold or silver ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My boyfriend took me to the Shane Co . and he let me pick it out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's so sweet . What was the occasion ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's the best part . It wasn't for anything special . He just wanted to buy me something .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're so lucky . If he bought you something for no special day , I wonder what he would buy you for your birthday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My birthday is coming up . We'll find out pretty soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wouldn't mind a necklace . I was at the jewelry shop looking around , and they have a couple of beautiful necklaces I want .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think I'm ready for a ring from him yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But you're ready for everything else ?
segments.speaker: S1
